text: White House senior advisor Jared Kushner wears a face mask in the Rose Garden before Pres. Trump's remarks on the coronavirus. A new White House policy distributed today directed staff to wear masks while working in the West Wing, sources tell @ABC News. https://t.co/QVQFTmnheH https://t.co/SSd5FeOTO5
